prompts: Create a large, earthy-toned Pokemon that resembles a strong rabbit with big ears.
I want a playful and robust bunny Pokemon that can dig through tough terrain.
Generate a Pokemon that incorporates both ground and normal types with unique physical traits.
Make a Pokemon that has a muscular build and prefers to live in grassy fields.
Imagine a Pokemon with oversized claws, capable of burrowing into the ground swiftly.
Design an adorable yet powerful bunny Pokemon that excels in combat with strong attacks.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of brown and gray colors, embodying a rugged appearance.
